entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
